item.title: Imagine Dragons - Bad Liar - Baritone Ukulele - Key of D
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele.
Chords Used: D, Bm, G, A, F#, Asus4
Key of D, lowered a half step from the original in Eb.
As performed by Imagine Dragons.
Tutorial Video (GCEA): Go to https://youtu.be/cTdAiw4Ox-M
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is based on Chordette for Education (Chordette is available from ukefarm.com, but the baritone font I am using is not yet available from ukefarm).
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Anthony Hamilton - Freedom - Key of C#m
item.description: From the motion picture Django Unchained Performed by Anthony Hamilton & Elayna Boynton.
